result.arabic_text: الٓرۚ كِتَٰبٌ أُحۡكِمَتۡ ءَايَٰتُهُۥ ثُمَّ فُصِّلَتۡ مِن لَّدُنۡ حَكِيمٍ خَبِيرٍ
result.translation: Alif Laam Raa.[1] Iki ni igitabo kigizwe n’imirongo yasobekanywe ubushishozi, hanyuma isesengurwa na Nyirubugenge buhambaye, Umumenyi wa byose.
result.footnotes: [1] Alif Laam Raa: Inyuguti nk’izi twazivuzeho mu ntangiriro ya Surat Al Baqarat.
